burlap.behavior.functionapproximation.dense.rbf.functions

Class GaussianRBF

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.functionapproximation.dense.rbf.RBF
      • burlap.behavior.functionapproximation.dense.rbf.functions.GaussianRBF

  • public class GaussianRBF
extends RBF
    An RBF whose response is dictated by a Gaussian kernel. More specifically, this RBF returns e^(-1 * d(x, c)^2 / e^2), where d(x, c) is the distance from a query state s to a defined "center," c, of this RBF and e is a bandwidth parameter on (0, +infinity) that affects the range of influence of this RBF. The larger the bandwidth value, the more uniform the response it gives to any arbitrary input state. The distance between the query state and the center state is determined by a provided distance function.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan.

                                                      DenseStateFeatures fvGen,
                                                      DistanceMetric metric,

        Creates a List of GaussianRBF units for each State provided using the given DenseStateFeatures, metric, and epsilon value.
        Parameters:
        states - the State objects around which a GaussianRBF will be created
        fvGen - the DenseStateFeatures used to convert states to a double array usable by RBF units.
        metric - the DistanceMetric to use
        epsilon - the bandwidth parameter.
        Returns:
        a List of GaussianRBF units.

      • generateGaussianRBFsForStates

        public static List<RBF> generateGaussianRBFsForStates(List<State> states,
